title: Anamoly Flat Pedal MTB Shoe gets Hero Rubber that’s stickier when wet
content:
Anamoly claim to have redefined the flat pedal MTB shoe with Hero Rubber that is said to get stickier when wet. The rad-looking aesthetic won’t be for everyone, but there are a bunch of standout features on this shoe that will undoubtedly tempt some to back their Kickstarter campaign. Let’s get into it. Anamoly MTB […]

The post Anamoly Flat Pedal MTB Shoe gets Hero Rubber that’s stickier when wet appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
